channel.title: Custom Objects
channel.description: I made a new object and when I try to put it somewhere It's invisible, but I can see the blue dot on the map. Can someone please tell me what I need to edit, I already edited GameObjectDef.xml in the server and Object.rscd in the client. If there is already a thread on this please redirect me, I already searched for one, but all I see is crap on rs2.

item.title: Custom Objects
item.dc:creator: @NotPro NotPro
item.description:
@NotPro wrote:

What if I wanted to change the color of a rock to green, how would I do that?

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Objects
item.dc:creator: @NotPro NotPro
item.description:
@NotPro wrote:

I copied the stuff for runerock1 and put it at the bottom of the xml file, then changed the objectmodel. Where do I find the file with the objects in it to change what a object looks like.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Objects
item.dc:creator: @NotPro NotPro
item.description:
@NotPro wrote:

I made a new rock to mine, but when I put it in a certain location(like the modroom) I can see that theres a object there in the minimap, but It’s invisible. I wanna know how I would make It show up.

Read full topic
